items.summary: Update the backend admin credentials to match the provided first admin account so that email/password login succeeds immediately: set `adminEmail` to `fitting.point.official@gmail.com` and `adminPassword` to `Farhan@456`, and ensure `authenticateAdminWithEmailPassword(email, password)` grants the caller the `#admin` role when those credentials match.

In the admin login screen UI, remove or disable the token-based "First-Time Setup" / "Grant Admin Access" bootstrap section since it is currently failing and the intended flow is direct email + password login; keep the email/password login form as the only admin access path presented to users.
